#summary This the introduction on the Desktop Tool

= Introduction = 

The *JBioWH's* Desktop tool shows the dataset list inserted into the relational database. Also, the user is able to view the amount of data inserted in the tables belonged to each dataset. The figures show the login dialog which connects the Desktop tool to the DBMS, !MySQL server in this case, and,after a successful logging, the main windows shows the inserted datasets.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/1.jpg

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/3.jpg

The *JBioWH's* Desktop tool has a Tab view based interface. This interface allow to users have an instantaneous control over its searches and results. 
 
The *Tabs Menu* gives access to the operation that could be performed over a selected Tab. Also, this menu can be used to open the main available Tabs in the Desktop Tool. This Tabs are Home Tab, [SearchTab Search Tab], [ConstrainsTab Constrain Tab] and the [SQLEditor SQL Editor Tab].

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/3.2.jpg

The *Result* Tab shows the *JBioWH's* objects that are saved during a section. The saved objects can be used through a mouse *Right Click* giving the options of this saved object. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/3.1.jpg
